pr_title: [IOTDB-811] fix upgrading mlog many times when upgrading system.properties crashed

timeline.body:
It suddenly occurs to me that `mlog` is a system file but `FSFactoryProducer.getFSFactory()` is for data files (like tsfile)... This may result in the problem that when upgrading 0.9 version tsfiles, HDFS cannot find `mlog` because it is actually stored in local.

Sorry I forgot and ignored it in the PR #1540 yesterday... 😣
```suggestion
      FileUtils.moveFile(tmpMLogFile, mlogFile);
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
It suddenly occurs to me that mlog is a system file but FSFactoryProducer.getFSFactory() is for data files (like tsfile)... This may result in the problem that when upgrading 0.9 version tsfiles, HDFS cannot find mlog because it is actually stored in local.

Sorry I forgot and ignored it in the PR #1540 yesterday... 😣

Suggested change
FSFactoryProducer.getFSFactory().moveFile(tmpMLogFile, mlogFile);
FileUtils.moveFile(tmpMLogFile, mlogFile);
